dcterms:description: A comprehensive high-resolution (1.8-mm) whole-brain 7T fMRI dataset consisting of data collected from eight human participants, each viewing 9,000–10,000 unique color natural scenes during 30–40 scan sessions.
dcterms:title: Natural Scenes Dataset (NSD)

dcterms:creator: Simone Palazzo
Concetto Spampinato
Isaak Kavasidis
Daniela Giordano
Joseph Schmidt
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: The EEG ImageNet dataset includes EEG recordings from six human subjects, each viewing 2,000 images from 40 object categories, sourced from the semantic-rich ImageNet dataset.
dcterms:title: EEG ImageNet Dataset

dcterms:creator: Tianye Wang
Haoxuan Yao
Tai Sing Lee
Jiayi Hong
Yang Li
Hongfei Jiang
Ian Max Andolina
Shiming Tang
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises widefield calcium imaging recordings from the dorsal V4 region of three awake macaque monkeys, captured in response to over 20,000 color natural images.
dcterms:title: V4 Widefield Calcium Imaging Dataset

dcterms:creator: Santiago A. Cadena
George H. Denfield
Edgar Y. Walker
Leon A. Gatys
Andreas Savas Toli
Matthias Bethge
Alexander S. Ecker
dcterms:description: The V1 Spiking Dataset comprises electrophysiological recordings from the V1 of two awake, fixating rhesus macaques, capturing neural activity using a 32-channel linear silicon probe.
dcterms:title: V1 Spiking Dataset
